vernac_cmds: Lemma derivable_pt_inv : forall (f:R -> R) (x:R), f x <> 0 -> derivable_pt f x -> derivable_pt (/ f) x.
intros f x H X; cut (derivable_pt (fct_cte 1 / f) x -> derivable_pt (/ f) x).

unfold div_fct, inv_fct, fct_cte; intros (x0,p); unfold derivable_pt; exists x0; unfold derivable_pt_abs; unfold derivable_pt_lim; unfold derivable_pt_abs in p; unfold derivable_pt_lim in p; intros; elim (p eps H0); intros; exists x1; intros; unfold Rdiv in H1; unfold Rdiv; rewrite <- (Rmult_1_l (/ f x)); rewrite <- (Rmult_1_l (/ f (x + h))).
Lemma pr_nu_var : forall (f g:R -> R) (x:R) (pr1:derivable_pt f x) (pr2:derivable_pt g x), f = g -> derive_pt f x pr1 = derive_pt g x pr2.
unfold derivable_pt, derive_pt; intros f g x (x0,p0) (x1,p1) ->.
apply uniqueness_limite with g x; assumption.
Lemma pr_nu_var2 : forall (f g:R -> R) (x:R) (pr1:derivable_pt f x) (pr2:derivable_pt g x), (forall h:R, f h = g h) -> derive_pt f x pr1 = derive_pt g x pr2.
unfold derivable_pt, derive_pt; intros f g x (x0,p0) (x1,p1) H.
cut (limit1_in (fun h:R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (fun h:R => h <> 0) x1 0).
intro H2; assert (H3 := uniqueness_step1 _ _ _ _ H0 H2).
unfold limit1_in; unfold limit_in; unfold dist; simpl; unfold R_dist; unfold limit1_in in H1; unfold limit_in in H1; unfold dist in H1; simpl in H1; unfold R_dist in H1.
intros; do 2 rewrite H; apply H5; assumption.
Lemma derivable_inv : forall f:R -> R, (forall x:R, f x <> 0) -> derivable f -> derivable (/ f).
Lemma derive_pt_inv : forall (f:R -> R) (x:R) (pr:derivable_pt f x) (na:f x <> 0), derive_pt (/ f) x (derivable_pt_inv f x na pr) = - derive_pt f x pr / Rsqr (f x).
intros; replace (derive_pt (/ f) x (derivable_pt_inv f x na pr)) with (derive_pt (fct_cte 1 / f) x (derivable_pt_div (fct_cte 1) f x (derivable_pt_const 1 x) pr na)).
rewrite derive_pt_div; rewrite derive_pt_const; unfold fct_cte; rewrite Rmult_0_l; rewrite Rmult_1_r; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_0_l; reflexivity.
Lemma Rabs_derive_1 : forall x:R, 0 < x -> derivable_pt_lim Rabs x 1.
unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r.
rewrite Rplus_0_r; unfold Rdiv; rewrite <- Rinv_r_sym.
rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rabs_R0; apply H0.
left; rewrite Rplus_comm; apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (- h); rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply H2.
Lemma Rabs_derive_2 : forall x:R, x < 0 -> derivable_pt_lim Rabs x (-1).
replace ((-(x + h) - - x) / h - -1) with 0 by now field.
rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; apply Rplus_lt_0_compat.
apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (- x); rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply H3.
Lemma Rderivable_pt_abs : forall x:R, x <> 0 -> derivable_pt Rabs x.
unfold continuity_pt; unfold continue_in; unfold limit1_in; unfold limit_in; simpl; unfold R_dist; intros; exists eps; split.

intros; rewrite H; rewrite Rabs_R0; unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rabs_Rabsolu; elim H1; intros; rewrite H in H3; unfold Rminus in H3; rewrite Ropp_0 in H3; rewrite Rplus_0_r in H3; apply H3.
Lemma continuity_finite_sum : forall (An:nat -> R) (N:nat), continuity (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) N).
replace (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) (S N)) with ((fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => (An k * y ^ k)%R) N) + (fun y:R => (An (S N) * y ^ S N)%R))%F.
replace (fun y:R => An (S N) * y ^ S N) with (mult_real_fct (An (S N)) (fun y:R => y ^ S N)).

Lemma derivable_pt_lim_fs : forall (An:nat -> R) (x:R) (N:nat), (0 < N)%nat -> derivable_pt_lim (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) N) x (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred N)).
intros; induction N as [| N HrecN].
replace (fun y:R => An 0%nat * 1 + An 1%nat * (y * 1)) with (fct_cte (An 0%nat * 1) + mult_real_fct (An 1%nat) (id * fct_cte 1))%F.
replace (1 * An 1%nat * 1) with (0 + An 1%nat * (1 * fct_cte 1 x + id x * 0)).
replace (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) (S N)) with ((fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => (An k * y ^ k)%R) N) + (fun y:R => (An (S N) * y ^ S N)%R))%F.
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred (S N))) with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred N) + An (S N) * (INR (S (pred (S N))) * x ^ pred (S N))).
replace (fun y:R => An (S N) * y ^ S N) with (mult_real_fct (An (S N)) (fun y:R => y ^ S N)).
replace (pred (S N)) with N; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
pattern N at 3; replace N with (pred (S N)).
replace (pred (S N)) with N; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
right; apply lt_le_trans with 1%nat; [ apply lt_O_Sn | assumption ].

Lemma derivable_pt_lim_finite_sum : forall (An:nat -> R) (x:R) (N:nat), derivable_pt_lim (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) N) x match N with | O => 0 | _ => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred N) end.
replace (fun _:R => An 0%nat) with (fct_cte (An 0%nat)); [ apply derivable_pt_lim_const | reflexivity ].
Lemma derivable_pt_finite_sum : forall (An:nat -> R) (N:nat) (x:R), derivable_pt (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) N) x.
exists (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred (S N))); apply H.
Lemma derivable_finite_sum : forall (An:nat -> R) (N:nat), derivable (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) N).
intros; unfold derivable; intro; apply derivable_pt_finite_sum.
Lemma derivable_pt_lim_cosh : forall x:R, derivable_pt_lim cosh x (sinh x).
replace (fun x0:R => (exp x0 + exp (- x0)) * / 2) with ((exp + comp exp (- id)) * fct_cte (/ 2))%F; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
replace ((exp x - exp (- x)) * / 2) with ((exp x + exp (- x) * -1) * fct_cte (/ 2) x + (exp + comp exp (- id))%F x * 0).
unfold plus_fct, mult_real_fct, comp, opp_fct, id, fct_cte; ring.
Lemma derivable_pt_lim_sinh : forall x:R, derivable_pt_lim sinh x (cosh x).
replace (fun x0:R => (exp x0 - exp (- x0)) * / 2) with ((exp - comp exp (- id)) * fct_cte (/ 2))%F; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
replace ((exp x + exp (- x)) * / 2) with ((exp x - exp (- x) * -1) * fct_cte (/ 2) x + (exp - comp exp (- id))%F x * 0).
unfold plus_fct, mult_real_fct, comp, opp_fct, id, fct_cte; ring.
Lemma derivable_pt_exp : forall x:R, derivable_pt exp x.
Lemma derivable_pt_cosh : forall x:R, derivable_pt cosh x.
Lemma derivable_pt_sinh : forall x:R, derivable_pt sinh x.
Lemma derive_pt_exp : forall x:R, derive_pt exp x (derivable_pt_exp x) = exp x.
Lemma derive_pt_cosh : forall x:R, derive_pt cosh x (derivable_pt_cosh x) = sinh x.
Lemma derive_pt_sinh : forall x:R, derive_pt sinh x (derivable_pt_sinh x) = cosh x.
Lemma sinh_lt : forall x y, x < y -> sinh x < sinh y.
intros x y xy; destruct (MVT_cor2 sinh cosh x y xy) as [c [Pc _]].
apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (Ropp (sinh x)); rewrite Rplus_opp_l, Rplus_comm.
unfold Rminus at 1 in Pc; rewrite Pc; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat;[ | ].
unfold cosh; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat;[|apply Rinv_0_lt_compat, Rlt_0_2].

command: intros f x H X; cut (derivable_pt (fct_cte 1 / f) x -> derivable_pt (/ f) x).

unfold div_fct, inv_fct, fct_cte; intros (x0,p); unfold derivable_pt; exists x0; unfold derivable_pt_abs; unfold derivable_pt_lim; unfold derivable_pt_abs in p; unfold derivable_pt_lim in p; intros; elim (p eps H0); intros; exists x1; intros; unfold Rdiv in H1; unfold Rdiv; rewrite <- (Rmult_1_l (/ f x)); rewrite <- (Rmult_1_l (/ f (x + h))).
unfold derivable_pt, derive_pt; intros f g x (x0,p0) (x1,p1) ->.
apply uniqueness_limite with g x; assumption.
unfold derivable_pt, derive_pt; intros f g x (x0,p0) (x1,p1) H.
cut (limit1_in (fun h:R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (fun h:R => h <> 0) x1 0).
intro H2; assert (H3 := uniqueness_step1 _ _ _ _ H0 H2).
unfold limit1_in; unfold limit_in; unfold dist; simpl; unfold R_dist; unfold limit1_in in H1; unfold limit_in in H1; unfold dist in H1; simpl in H1; unfold R_dist in H1.
intros; do 2 rewrite H; apply H5; assumption.
intros; replace (derive_pt (/ f) x (derivable_pt_inv f x na pr)) with (derive_pt (fct_cte 1 / f) x (derivable_pt_div (fct_cte 1) f x (derivable_pt_const 1 x) pr na)).
rewrite derive_pt_div; rewrite derive_pt_const; unfold fct_cte; rewrite Rmult_0_l; rewrite Rmult_1_r; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_0_l; reflexivity.
unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r.
rewrite Rplus_0_r; unfold Rdiv; rewrite <- Rinv_r_sym.
rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rabs_R0; apply H0.
left; rewrite Rplus_comm; apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (- h); rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply H2.
replace ((-(x + h) - - x) / h - -1) with 0 by now field.
rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; apply Rplus_lt_0_compat.
apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (- x); rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply H3.
unfold continuity_pt; unfold continue_in; unfold limit1_in; unfold limit_in; simpl; unfold R_dist; intros; exists eps; split.

intros; rewrite H; rewrite Rabs_R0; unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rabs_Rabsolu; elim H1; intros; rewrite H in H3; unfold Rminus in H3; rewrite Ropp_0 in H3; rewrite Rplus_0_r in H3; apply H3.
replace (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) (S N)) with ((fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => (An k * y ^ k)%R) N) + (fun y:R => (An (S N) * y ^ S N)%R))%F.
replace (fun y:R => An (S N) * y ^ S N) with (mult_real_fct (An (S N)) (fun y:R => y ^ S N)).
intros; induction N as [| N HrecN].
replace (fun y:R => An 0%nat * 1 + An 1%nat * (y * 1)) with (fct_cte (An 0%nat * 1) + mult_real_fct (An 1%nat) (id * fct_cte 1))%F.
replace (1 * An 1%nat * 1) with (0 + An 1%nat * (1 * fct_cte 1 x + id x * 0)).
replace (fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => An k * y ^ k) (S N)) with ((fun y:R => sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => (An k * y ^ k)%R) N) + (fun y:R => (An (S N) * y ^ S N)%R))%F.
replace (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred (S N))) with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred N) + An (S N) * (INR (S (pred (S N))) * x ^ pred (S N))).
replace (fun y:R => An (S N) * y ^ S N) with (mult_real_fct (An (S N)) (fun y:R => y ^ S N)).
replace (pred (S N)) with N; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
pattern N at 3; replace N with (pred (S N)).
replace (pred (S N)) with N; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
right; apply lt_le_trans with 1%nat; [ apply lt_O_Sn | assumption ].
replace (fun _:R => An 0%nat) with (fct_cte (An 0%nat)); [ apply derivable_pt_lim_const | reflexivity ].
exists (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (pred (S N))); apply H.
intros; unfold derivable; intro; apply derivable_pt_finite_sum.
replace (fun x0:R => (exp x0 + exp (- x0)) * / 2) with ((exp + comp exp (- id)) * fct_cte (/ 2))%F; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
replace ((exp x - exp (- x)) * / 2) with ((exp x + exp (- x) * -1) * fct_cte (/ 2) x + (exp + comp exp (- id))%F x * 0).
unfold plus_fct, mult_real_fct, comp, opp_fct, id, fct_cte; ring.
replace (fun x0:R => (exp x0 - exp (- x0)) * / 2) with ((exp - comp exp (- id)) * fct_cte (/ 2))%F; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
replace ((exp x + exp (- x)) * / 2) with ((exp x - exp (- x) * -1) * fct_cte (/ 2) x + (exp - comp exp (- id))%F x * 0).
unfold plus_fct, mult_real_fct, comp, opp_fct, id, fct_cte; ring.
intros x y xy; destruct (MVT_cor2 sinh cosh x y xy) as [c [Pc _]].
apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with (Ropp (sinh x)); rewrite Rplus_opp_l, Rplus_comm.
unfold Rminus at 1 in Pc; rewrite Pc; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat;[ | ].
unfold cosh; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat;[|apply Rinv_0_lt_compat, Rlt_0_2].
